message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $180. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not comfortable going as low as $120. I can meet you halfway, though - how about $165?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you try to get closer to $140?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to make one more concession - how about $155?
I'm really close to walking away, but I still think this product could be a great fit. Can you meet me at $145?
I can see you're really invested in this product, Bob, and I appreciate your enthusiasm. I'm willing to make one final concession - how about $152.50?
I'm really close to walking away, but I still think this product could be a great fit. Can you meet me at $147?
